content: What is the annual leave entitlement for a General Service staff member?

output: According to IOM HR Policy, General Service staff are entitled to 2.5 working days of annual leave per month of service [Policy 4.1][Rule 12.3].

content: Is there a probation period for new Professional category staff?

output: Yes, Professional category staff undergo a probation period of six months, as per IOM HR Rule 8.2 [Rule 8.2].
